metadata.title: CImbinator: A web-based tool for drug synergy analysis in small-and large-scale datasets
metadata.abstract: © The Author 2017. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.Motivation: Drug synergies are sought to identify combinations of drugs particularly beneficial. User-friendly software solutions that can assist analysis of large-scale datasets are required. Results: CImbinator is a web-service that can aid in batch-wise and in-depth analyzes of data from small-scale and large-scale drug combination screens. CImbinator offers to quantify drug combination effects, using both the commonly employed median effect equation, as well as advanced experimental mathematical models describing dose response relationships.

description: Web-based tool for drug synergy analysis in small- and large-scale datasets.
name: CImbinator
